ModMetaData.name: Arachne CE Patch
ModMetaData.author: MagicHp
ModMetaData.description:
A compatibility patch for Arachne race and Combat Extended 1.6.
The Arachne Bullets have been removed because having special ammo for a single gun didn't make much sense. The fact that I didn't manage to successfully patch in custom ammo yet is clearly unrelated........ The Arachne P90 now uses the same caliber as in the real world.
